fieldUpdates.description: Update the Contract Start Date field with recommendation's agreement effective date value
fieldUpdates.name: GE_PRM_Contract_Start_Date_Pre_Populate

fieldUpdates.description: This will update the contract term based on the recommendation's agreement term
fieldUpdates.formula: CASE( GE_PRM_Recommendation_Link__r.GE_PRM_Agreement_term__c , '1 Year',1, '2 Years', 2, '3 Years', 3, '4 Years', 4, '5 Years', 5, '6 Years', 6, '7 Years', 7, '8 Years', 8, '9 Years', 9, '10 Years', 10, '11 Years', 11, '12 Years', 12, '13 Years', 13, '14 Years', 14, '15 Years', 15, '16 Years', 16,0) * 12
fieldUpdates.name: GE_PRM_Contract_Term_Pre_Populate

fieldUpdates.description: update Execute time to current date/time
fieldUpdates.name: GE_PRM_Execute_time_update
GE Sign completed Date Status Update
On Hold by GE Date Update

rules.fullName: Contract sent to Channel Partner for signature
rules.description: Contract sent to Channel Partner for signature
Set the value of Contract status to Expired when Contract End Date is reached

rules.formula: AND ( OwnerId != Null, RecordType.Name = 'Contract', (EndDate - Expiration_Alert_Days_GEOG__c) >= TODAY() )

rules.fullName: GE CP signed contract Date Status Update
rules.booleanFilter: 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 6 AND 7 AND ((4 AND 8) OR (5 AND 9))
1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 6 AND 7 AND ((5 AND 8) OR (4 AND 9))

rules.fullName: GE Contract CP Date Status Update
rules.booleanFilter: 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 6 AND 7 AND ((4 AND 9) OR (5 AND 8))

rules.fullName: GE Contract Draft Date Status Update
rules.booleanFilter: 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 6 AND 7 AND ((4 AND 8) OR (5 AND 9))
1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND 6 AND ((8 AND 9) OR (5 AND 7))

rules.fullName: GE Sign completed Date Status Update
rules.booleanFilter: 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 6 AND 7 AND ((4 AND 8) OR (5 AND 9))

rules.fullName: GE_Email Alert Before 180 Days of Contract End Date
GE_Email Alert Before 30 Days of Contract End Date
GE_Email Alert Before 30 Days of Contract Pricing Validity Date
GE_Email Alert Before 90 Days of Contract End Date
GE_Email Alert Before 90 Days of Contract Pricing Validity Date
GE_Email Alert On Last Day of Contract Pricing Validity Date
GE_Email Alert on Last Date Contract End Date

rules.formula: AND( $RecordType.DeveloperName ='OG_Frame_Agreement', OR(AND( ISBLANK(StartDate), ISBLANK(GE_OG_Contract_End_Date__c) ,StartDate < Today() ,GE_OG_Contract_End_Date__c > Today())))

rules.fullName: GE_PRM_Awaiting Review before to be sent to Channel Date_populate
GE_PRM_Awaiting to be sent to Channel Date_populate
GE_PRM_Contract On-hold by GE Cycle Time_populate

rules.description: This rule will populate the field contract start date
This rule will populate contract term field on creation if user did not enter the data on creation
To update the Execute Time with the current date/time whenever the Status changes to 'Execute'
This rule will send an email alert to channel manager (recommendation owner) when contract status reaches "Executed", "Non-Renewed", "Terminated".
rules.formula: GE_PRM_Contract_Status__c ='Executed' || GE_PRM_Contract_Status__c ='Non Renewed' || GE_PRM_Contract_Status__c ='Terminated' && ISCHANGED(GE_PRM_Contract_Status__c) && GE_PRM_NRT_Email__c = False && Termination_Email__c = False && GE_PRM_Record_Type_Name__c != 'Channel Master Agreement' && GE_PRM_Record_Type_Name__c != 'Channel Addendum Agreement'
AND( ISPICKVAL(Status ,'On hold by GE'), OR($RecordType.DeveloperName = 'GE_PRM_Agreement',$RecordType.DeveloperName = 'GE_PRM_Master_Agreement'), ISNULL( GE_PRM_On_Hold_by_GE_Date__c ) )

rules.description: This rule will populate the field previous contract number on both agreement and master agreement records

rules.formula: AND(NOT(ISBLANK( Account.Name) ), OR( $RecordType.Name = 'Channel Addendum Agreement', $RecordType.Name ='Channel Master Agreement'))
